Disease.content:

Paragraph: Intramuscular HBIg was well tolerated in all patients .

The "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Intramuscular HBIg (HBIg stands for Human Botulism Immune Globulin)
2. Botulism (as the paragraph implies that Intramuscular HBIg is used to treat or prevent botulism)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the revised "Disease" entities in the paragraph:
